name: Thardamum
description:
A CHALLENGING GAME.... ARE YOU READY.... TO FALL... A MILLION TIMES? ARE YOU READY FOR THARDAMUM?

     Inspired by the most challenging platform games, Thardamum comes to challenge all those who think they are invincible. If you are one of those people, prepare for an adventure in a 2D world full of obstacles that will keep you from reaching your goal.
     The purpose of the game is basically you control Bob, and collect all the cubes on the map, and get to the elevator that will take you to the next level. But make no mistake, it will not be easy.

IT'S READY ... SO LET'S GO.

Commands:
Move: Arrows.
Z: Dash.
X: Jump.

"It is possible to change the commands before entering the game".
